name: PlagiarismCheck.org
description: PlagiarismCheck.org provides an AI-powered tool to detect plagiarism and AI-generated content, ensuring originality for educators, students, and content creators.
longDescription: PlagiarismCheck.org is an online platform designed to help users verify the originality of texts by detecting plagiarism and AI-generated content with advanced algorithms. Founded in 2011, it serves educators, students, and professionals by offering a user-friendly interface and integrations with platforms like Google Docs, Moodle, and Canvas. The service aims to promote academic integrity and creative writing by identifying similarities, substitutions, and rearrangements in text, as well as distinguishing human-written content from AI-generated material. It provides detailed reports with source links, enabling users to refine their work before submission. The platform is GDPR-compliant, ensuring data privacy, and supports multiple languages to cater to a global audience. Its mission is to empower users to maintain authenticity in their writing while simplifying the process of originality verification.
features: Advanced plagiarism detection scans texts against billions of web pages and databases to identify similarities with high accuracy.
AI content detection uses TraceGPT to pinpoint AI-generated text, such as from ChatGPT, with a 99% accuracy rate.
Grammar and spelling checks highlight errors in over 15 languages, improving the overall quality of written content.
Real-time source comparison provides hyperlinks to original sources, allowing users to verify and cite references easily.
Integration with platforms like Google Docs, Moodle, and Canvas streamlines plagiarism checks within existing workflows.
Downloadable PDF reports offer clear, professional summaries of plagiarism and AI detection results for easy sharing.
Fingerprint technology identifies unique writing styles to verify authorship and detect inconsistencies.
Customizable settings allow institutions to tailor the tool to their specific academic or professional needs.

faqs.question: What is PlagiarismCheck.org used for?
faqs.answer: PlagiarismCheck.org is used to detect plagiarism and AI-generated content in texts, ensuring originality for students, educators, and professionals.

faqs.question: Does PlagiarismCheck.org offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, it provides a free trial for one page (275 words), allowing users to test the plagiarism detection tool.

faqs.question: Can it detect AI-generated content like ChatGPT?
faqs.answer: Yes, the TraceGPT feature detects AI-generated text with 99% accuracy, highlighting problematic sections for review.

faqs.question: Which platforms does PlagiarismCheck.org integrate with?
faqs.answer: It integrates with Google Docs, Moodle, Canvas, and Google Classroom for seamless originality checks.

faqs.question: Is my data safe with PlagiarismCheck.org?
faqs.answer: The platform is GDPR-compliant, ensuring user data privacy and not storing uploaded texts in its database.

faqs.question: How accurate is the plagiarism detection?
faqs.answer: The tool uses advanced algorithms to achieve 99% accuracy, minimizing false positives and detecting even subtle similarities.

faqs.question: Can it check texts in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, it supports plagiarism and grammar checks in over 15 languages, catering to a global user base.

faqs.question: How does the pricing work for checking documents?
faqs.answer: Pricing is based on pages checked (1 page = 275 words), with a starting rate of $5.99 for 20 pages for individual users.

faqs.question: Does it work with Turnitin?
faqs.answer: It serves as an alternative to Turnitin, offering similar functionality with detailed reports to ensure plagiarism-free submissions.
